attributes.long-description:
Pirates, adventure and monkeys? That’s right, you get all that and more in the Monkey Island® Special Edition bundle. Now, for the first time ever, you can enjoy both The Secret of Monkey Island®: Special Edition and Monkey Island™ 2 Special Edition: LeChuck's Revenge™ together in one great digital bundle.

Play them again for the first time. These hilarious swashbuckling misadventures of the wannabe-pirate Guybrush Threepwood are back in signature special edition detail, featuring:

• Re-imagined contemporary art styles presented in high definition.
• Complete voice over using original Monkey Island™ franchise cast members.
• Renewed music scores using live instruments.
• Scene-for-scene hot swap to transition between Special Edition and Classic modes at any time.
• In-game puzzle hint systems.
• Plus much more!


Look behind you, a three-headed monkey!
attributes.name: Monkey Island®: Special Edition Bundle
